package xiangmu;
public class Ceshi {
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        // 给定正整数n，计算n的阶乘
        // n的阶乘 n! = 1 * 2 * 3 * ... * (n-1) * n
        // 5! = 1 * 2 * 3 * 4 * 5
        int n = 5;
        // 如果是计算连加，变量jieguo初始值是0
        // 如果是计算连乘，变量jieguo初始值是1
        int jieguo = 1;
        for(int m = 1; m <= n; m = m + 1) {
            jieguo = jieguo * m;
        }
        System.out.println(n + "! = " + jieguo);
    }
} 
5! = 120
